name: monorepo
description: A monorepo with .NET Core and React TypeScript

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm nx run api:serve" "pnpm nx run web:serve"
scripts.dev:clean: pwsh -Command "Get-Process -Name 'dotnet','node' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host 'Cleaned up development processes'"
scripts.dev:start: pnpm run dev:clean && pnpm run dev
scripts.clean: nx reset && rimraf node_modules apps/*/node_modules libs/*/node_modules
